column4: does anyone know if the VGA out of the computer works on VirtualBox? I have a problem with my VGA out in Ubuntu and I was thinking to give it a try through VirtualBox
it might work, since virtualbox use the host OS at all.. so the guest SO should run ok too
so you think I should install the ATI drivers on the virtual box and then connect it with the VGA out inside Ubuntu? will this work?
the SO inside virtualbox wont recnize your hardware and its drivers, you can install virtualbox guest addtions to get a better graphics into the guest SO
